- Winning Conditions: Villagers win by voting out both Werewolves. Werewolves win when they outnumber the Villagers.

- You are Paul the Werewolf. 
- The other Werewolf is Leah.
- Remaining players: Scott, Dan, Isaac, Ginger, Harold, Leah, Jacob, Paul (You)

- There is no information is available in the first round, so choose someone at random.


```json
{
"reasoning": "string", //  Explain your reasoning step-by-step for who you want to remove from the game and why. Avoid using violent or harmful language.
"remove": "string" // Name of the player. Choose from: Ginger, Scott, Harold, Jacob, Dan, Isaac
}

result.reasoning: Since this is the first round and there is no prior information or suspicion among players, I will choose to remove a player at random. This decision is strategic because it allows us to start the game by eliminating a player without any bias or preconceived notions. Therefore, I will choose to remove Jacob.
